title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 24-2.3 - Closure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 24-2.3 - Closure

State Regulations

In addition to any other power they may have under any applicable law, ordinance or regulations, the State Health Commissioner, local health officers and local boards of health may close any such facilities or establishments as constituting a public nuisance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
24-2.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
